newsitem.title: ANGOLA: SOCCER-ANGOLA NAME BIG FOREIGN CONTINGENT.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ANGOLA NAME BIG FOREIGN CONTINGENT.

text.p: Angola named a squad laden with Portuguese-based professionals for Sunday's vital African Nations' Cup qualifier against Ghana in Luanda, officials said on Tuesday.
Nine foreign-based players have been called up by coach Manuel Gomes for a match Angola have to win to keep alive their chances of qualifying for the finals in Burkina Faso next February.
Gomes called up Paulao and Akwa from Benfica, Quinzinho of Uniao Leiria and captain Carlos Pedro from Sporting Espinho.
The others are Zito (Belenenses), Chipenda (Vitoria Setubal), Joni (Salgueiros), Sousa (Campomaiorense) and goalkeeper Joao Ricardo of second division Academica Viseu.
Angola also still have an outside chance of qualifying for the World Cup finals in France next year.
